Our foundation is Naijalink Limited, a company founded in 2009 with a mission to link international companies with reputable companies and qualified opportunities in Nigeria. Initially nothing more than a laptop on a kitchen table, Naijalink grew exponentially in terms of clients, projects, employees &ndash; and countries we worked in. To reflect this growth, it became time to rebrand as Commercium Africa, which was officially launched in 2022.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Creative Storyteller and Content Lead

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

About the Job


	We are looking for a wild mind with structure. A content lead who can dream big and make it happen.
	You will create scroll-stopping content across social, OOH, events, and marketing, turn chaotic ideas into smooth productions, and lead a team to bring campaigns to life.
	If you love storytelling, planning shoots, writing scripts, and shaping brand experiences while keeping things organised, this is your playground.
	You will thrive here if you write with energy, understand social trends and culture, and enjoy leading creative execution from concept to final cut while collaborating with a fun and supportive team.


Benefits


	Perks include hybrid work, group insurance, birthday celebrations, and awards for top performance.

Creative Storyteller and Content Lead Job at Commercium Africa




        
    

        
        Commercium Africa is a market leader in providing services for international companies who wish to expand to, or do business with, key African markets. Our foundation is Naijalink Limited, a company founded in 2009 with a mission to link international companies with reputable companies and qualified opportunities in Nigeria. Initially nothing more than a laptop on a kitchen table, Naijalink grew exponentially in terms of clients, projects, employees – and countries we worked in. To reflect this growth, it became time to rebrand as Commercium Africa, which was officially launched in 2022.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Storyteller and Content Lead

Job Location: Lagos
